definitions.definition: used when the man or boy who performs an action is also affected by it

examples.text: Peter ought to be ashamed of himself.

definitions.definition: used to emphasize the male subject or object of a sentence

examples.text: Did you see the manager himself?

definitions.definition: to be in a normal state of health or happiness

examples.text: He didn't seem quite himself this morning.
He needed space to be himself.
He managed to repair the car by himself.

definitions.definition: for only him to have or use; not shared

examples.text: He has the house to himself during the week.
